vlive.korean: 준비됐어요? 놀 준비됐어요? Are you ready? Are you ready to have fun? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 22. 서울대의 두 동아리 츄플 & 바팩 파이널에서 만나다!
vlive.english: Are you ready? Are you ready to have fun?

vlive.korean: 즐길 준비 됐어요 여러분들? Are you ready to enjoy? 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 23. 현재 1위 츄플에게 도전하는 경희대 래빈 & 용인 리퍼블릭!
재밌어요 - 준비되셨나요? So funny. - Are you ready? 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) OFFLINE #2

vlive.english: I'm so nervous. - Are you ready?

examples.korean: She was ready and primed for action. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 행동할 각오와 대비가 되어 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was ready and primed for action. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The snake coiled up, ready to strike. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 뱀이 똬리를 틀고 달려들 기세를 하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The snake coiled up, ready to strike. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The bomb was primed, ready to explode. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 폭탄은 폭파 준비가 다 갖추어져 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The bomb was primed, ready to explode. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The hawk poised in mid-air ready to swoop. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 매는 허공에서 덤벼들 태세를 하고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hawk poised in mid-air ready to swoop. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His face puckered, and he was ready to cry. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 얼굴이 일그러지더니 그가 울려고 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His face puckered, and he was ready to cry. Add to Wordbook
